website_summaries.verdict: Women's mid-cut basketball shoes featuring the brand's Cloudfoam cushioning technology.
pros: Comfortable fit and support for prolonged use
Exceptional ankle support for lateral moves
Excellent shoe quality with durable materials

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I normally wear a 8.5 so I ordered an 8.5 and they fit great. They are super cute and just enough baby pink to set them off. My only issue is the insoles are not actually glued into the shoe but maybe this is the normal design. It doesn’t affect the fit and don’t foresee it being a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: MonkiePants

customer_reviews.title: They look good and they're really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These things are phat. They look good and they're really comfortable. They have that Adidas foam technology. In addition, they're lightweight. B Ball shoes used to be so heavy, but you don't feel like you have concrete blocks on. I don't play bball anymore, I just I enjoy how cute and comfy they are.
customer_reviews.author: carrie l. nutt

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 and the 8 was too big. So I returned them and got 7.5 which was still a little too big. They were comfortable but my foot was sliding around a lot and I thought it would give me blisters eventually. Both boxes were totally destroyed when they came. I ended up returning both pairs because I found some Nikes I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: L Block

customer_reviews.title: Adidas! Pink and grey! 💟💟
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with high tops, especially Adidas. These are beautiful. I sprayed them with waterproof sealant and wore them through 4 planes and a week in California. And they are still like new. I got so many compliments. I did change the laces to a light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Julez Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size (recieved 9.5 US twice), however fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: It says 7.5 Medium US however I recieved 9.5 US shoes twice in a row even after ordering a replacement. However I will stress the shoe quality and material is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: MMKIM

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Very comfy in basketball gym class. Bought a half size smaller after reading the reviews and they fix great!
customer_reviews.author: Neenie

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this shoes for my daughter for school. I am very happy with my purchase. My daughter love her shoes. True to size fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Julietta St Juste

customer_reviews.title: The quality is really good I think if they fit me better size wise ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the way they fit my foot. The quality is really good I think if they fit me better size wise then they’re be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: But the sneakrs is awesome.. Love it 😍 good quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave only 4 stars ,just because the box was destroyed.. But the sneakrs is awesome.. Love it 😍 good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ignore description at top... NOT A SIZE 7.5... size 9.5!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great quality! Awesome sole and comfort in-sole.... it’s a one star rating because I thought I was getting a size 7.5, as stated in the description, but got a 9.5.... Amazon was unable to exchange the shoe for the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Stevens

customer_reviews.title: NOT leather false advertising
customer_reviews.text: If you expect to receive a leather shoe, as advertised, you will be disappointed. These are synthetic per the label inside the shoe. It infuriates me to go through the hassle of returning and waiting weeks for my money to come back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Cf Superhoops Mid W Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Hoops dna with super comfort. These mid-cut shoes sport a leather upper with suede overlays and stitched-on 3-stripes.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch
